alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northeastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, east central Walton and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 445 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vernon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bradford, Live Oak, Wausau, Hinsons Crossroads, Moose Pond, Fountain, Singer Road, Holmes Valley, Gainer Spring, Millers Ferry, Porter Lake, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Compass Lake, Sylvania, Betts, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad and Orange Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
